name: Detective Solitaire Inspector Magic
description: 120 unique deals – investigate a mysterious crime!

name: Exphelius: Arena
description: The Exphelius Championships are a long-standing series of ruthless arena fights between high-tech space vessels. Clever engineering paired with quick reflexes makes the deadly duo on the ladder. Only one person walks out alive. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Red Evil
description: Alice returned to her hometown after a long journey. But nobody was there. Save the inhabitants and defeat the leader of the gang.

name: Mulite Sword Man
description: MULITE is a light action role-playing game that focuses on the collocating of operation and gameplay. The game provides a lot of equipment and skills. Based on the retro action role-playing game mechanism and combined with the Rogue-lite elements, this game abandons the traditional RPG lengthy dialogues and boring tasks, enabling players...

name: Traps Ahead!
description: A 2D platformer game. Try to avoid tricky obstacles and get the chest!

name: Boomerang X
description: Armed with a magical boomerang, slice, fly, and dive through flocks of evil creatures in this acrobatic arena shooter. Obliterate wave after wave and journey ever downwards into the shadows.

name: Lee Inside TV
description: Lee Inside TV is a mix between a one screen platformer and a puzzle game, where gameplay is always changing and each level fells unique. Think outside the box and use the classical mechanics of platformer games to solve puzzles and or finish the level.

name: Space Carrot
description: Arcade game about collecting carrot growing on asteroids. Perfect way to spend 5 minutes while waiting for something. Best played with a gamepad.

name: Project Grove
description: Explore the weird and wonderful forest of Dacrima as aging alchemist Prof Edric Tayte, alongside your robot companion L-P1N! Forage for ingredients and brew potions to empower you with potent abilities. Uncover the secrets of the forest in this tale of two unlikely friends.

name: Lands of Pharaoh: Episode 1
description: Lands of Pharaoh is a multi-camera-angle based adventure game. The hero, Heragos, tries to get to Cairo in order to find the messages, related to his divine duty, left for him by Nefertiti.

name: Knights of Light: The Prologue
description: Action adventure role playing game during medieval age in Middle East. Story is based on a historical battle at the 7th century in Iraq. Inspired by The Witcher and Mount & Blade with a rich story with two playable characters. Relive the battle events and lead your troops to victory.

name: Katana Kata
description: Indie souls-like with innovative fight system where you practice your Katana on the path for endless improvement; again and again.

name: Cursed Pagoda
description: Classic Freecell Solitaire combined with the unique story of a mysterious tower filled with traveling spirits! Play through more than 250 stages to unlock the memories of those trapped inside. Plus an Unlimited Freecell Mode!

name: Solar Panic: Utter Distress
description: Solar Panic is a first-person comedy adventure game. Follow a true story that we made up and explore exotic places filled with funny and/or stupid encounters. Wield top-notch gadgets and meet weird and socially awkward characters as you stumble upon a SERIOUS mystery.

name: Blood Scrolls
description: Eleven Fighters, Ten Blood Scrolls, and one throne at victory! Battle for your chance to become the new Sun God or the universe!

name: The Amazing T.K's Suburban Nightmares
description: Return of the Slashers! The nightmarish events are starting up again due to a serial killer worshiping cult-like group on the rise calling themselves H.A.T.E (Humans.Are.Truly.Evil). Delancy Dekker, now P.I, returns to her childhood suburban neighborhood while on a new case that seems all too familiar.

name: Prop and Seek
description: Prop and seek is a hide and seek game which 16 players take turns to hide or seek. You can be a prop to hide or be a hunter to find all hidden props.

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Cinderella - Collector's Edition
description:
This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector's Edition includes:

• Rescue Red Riding Hood’s Grandmother in the bonus game!
• Inspect hidden cabinets, concoct potions, and more by replaying HOPs and mini-games and earn achievements!
• Tons of magic shoes, moonstones, and morphing objects to find!
• Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, music, videos, and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide!

name: Bogatyr
description: Bogatyr is a third-person action RPG set in a fantasy setting of Ancient Russia. The main character-a great warrior who returned from a ten-year war on the Southern Borders finds his native land in desolation. The hero will have to deal with what happened in the district, participate in the Civil War and defeat the Ancient evil.

name: Acid Knife
description: Battle Death Centipedes in the melting psychedelic void. Slower, more intentional side-scrolling combat, with an emphasis on positioning and improvisation.

name: The Drifter
description: The Drifter is a 2d point and click adventure in the classic style. Taking cues from the recent revival of the genre there is an emphasis on story, with puzzle solving being the glue that ties it together rather than the focus. Mick's a pretty practical guy, and so puzzles are down-to-earth, designed to be unobtrusive, and give an investigative feel. We're keeping the pacing is quick and lean, you'll never be wandering around lost for long periods - Mick is propelled through the story at a good clip, from one situation to another, with barely a moment to catch his breath.

name: AIM 3: War Protocol
description: "AIM: War Protocol" is a sequel to "AIM 2: Clan War". You are artificial mind that moves around the world using a hover. A huge world awaits you, full of dangers, quests, challenges. Communicate, fight, trade, explore!

name: Suka's Escape
description: Suka Solvepuzzeler seems to only have two real talents in life, solving escape rooms and getting into ever more improbable situations. Relive some of his most daring escapes and most improbable circumstances using this ultra advanced software that will in no way ever turn against you.

name: Cubeland VR
description: Collect, throw and avoid bombs! Multi-play casual shooting game with your basic moves, full of action but still easy to play.

name: Averon Rising
description: Averon is a futuristic empire building game that gives players agency to create and direct a nation in anyway they want to roleplay.

name: The Phantom Fable: Steven Universe
description:
The Phantom Fable is a purchasable mobile action-adventure game developed and published by Cartoon Network that was released on iOS and Android devices on April 18, 2019.

It was taken off of app stores in 2020 for unknown reasons.

name: Day in the Life of a Harpy
description:
Day in the Life of a Harpy is a short but sweet story of a harpy girl that was wandering out late and must get home before dinner. 
 
The game features moderately paced platforming, lighthearted visuals, and upbeat music. 
 
The main protagonist, Duri, has various skills that can help her fend off creatures that threaten her. Her main method of attack is to shoot feathers from her wings, but she has other methods, such as a bag that she can use to capture and throw enemies. She can use her wings to keep her in the air, though, being young, she can only flap them several times before she needs to rest on the ground again. 
 
This adventure takes the player through a variety of stages that are simplistic and fun in their own ways. Day in the Life of a Harpy is a short , but uplifting experience.

name: Anonymous Player
description: Guide Albert on a long and winding path and help him save his world. Get to know his friends and discover the mystery of destruction. You are not just a player. You are a friend of Albert, and if you wish, you can also be a friend of the developer.

name: Blue Boy: Bleeding Out
description: Blue Boy: Bleeding Out is a short but challenging platformer where you bleed as you run. Avoid touching your bloody path on the way to the exit...

name: Krystopia: A Puzzle Journey
description: Follow Nova Dune, a space explorer in her quest to find out about the unfamiliar distress signal she received aboard her ship. Determined to investigate it, she finds herself on a desolated planet where all civilization has vanished.

name: Ghostball
description: You never know what skills can help you in your adventures. This time you should master your kicking talent! Kick the magic ball and clear the world from evil spirits.

name: Remember, Lights Out
description: Can you survive using just your memory? Play this short and sweet game to put your memory to the test! Light is your resource, and it will disappear over time. As you collect orbs, your world will go dark. You'll have to remember the level's design to find the escape.

name: Super Novel Collector (Speedrun Edition)
description: Super Novel Collector is a 2D Platform game built for speedrunning. It features an inbuilt timing and split system. It can also be played casually and with a random level generator. Xander, a descendant of the last librarian of Alexandria, seeks to correct the error of his ancestor and restore the library.

name: Creme de la Creme
description: Climb to the very top of the class at your exclusive private school for socialites! Will you study hard, find a perfect match, or embrace scandal?

name: Unlock the King
description: A originally designed puzzle game inspired by Chess. Move the pieces and create a path to Unlock the King.

name: Colorgrid
description: Colorgrid is a puzzle game about mixing colors in a Lab. Find the correct positions for your lasers and mirrors to get the right mix of colors in each material.

name: Vega Motions: Project Unleashed
description: A 3rd person, 1 vs 1 skills-based fighting game set in a destructible arena.

name: Fulfillment
description: Exciting Adventure About the Joys of Working at an Amazin' Fulfillment Center! Short, social commentary game that is 100% free, no micro-transactions.

name: Silicomrades
description: Silicomrades is a couch co-op shooter for two players about malfunctioning robots fighting against unstoppable bureaucracy. Build your own robots from parts providing different bonuses as well as potential defects. Fight the evil robo-politicians and fall apart but do not fall back!

name: Short Scary Stories
description: Shoot, reload and continue. Watch the dark corners.

name: Bot Net: Ramshackle Robotics
description: "Build your bots, command your army, defeat the invaders!" 'Bot Net: Ramshackle Robotics' is a turn-based strategy rogue-like where you'll build an army of ramshackle robots to fight off an alien invasion!

name: Big Red Hood: Halloween
description: Match-2. Erotic adventures with maidens of different kinds, intrigues, and epic final await you. The game will impress as the fans of visual novels, so as good puzzle lovers.

name: Lab 7: Cold Nights
description: In LAB 7: Cold Nights - wise foresight decides on the outcome of your fate. Wasted coins, reckless use of electricity, and poor time management will lead to your demise. Explore your surroundings, build defenses and find a way to freedom.

name: Wizardians: In Defence of Magic
description: Wizardians: In Defence of Magic is a multiplayer adventure card game with elements of RPG and resource management, created on the basis of innovative approach to collectible card games.

name: Zero Friction
description: This is a virtual reality hover car racing game, that is specifically developed for use with a racing wheel and pedals, but can also be played with an xbox controller or keyboard.

name: Robber's Horror
description: A horror escape game set in an abandoned hospital. Aim to escape while hiding from the murderer wandering in the stage.

name: The Secret of Hutton Grammar School
description: Uncover the secrets of a mysterious cult in The Secret of Hutton Church of England Grammar School: VGA Edition!

name: IKO 39
description: IKO 39 is an adventure sci-fi detective. Find out what happened at the station, which had lost contact with the Earth. Emie – the artificial intelligence of the station – will help you to solve the mystery.

name: Endless Knight
description: Endless Knight is an unusual fighting game inspired by the black knight scene from the Python classic 'The Holy Grail'. The game sees you cutting opponents' limbs off in a fight to the death!

name: MetaSpace
description: MetaSpace is a 2D action strategy game. Explore the ever-changing planets and stars to gather resources and items to bolster your strength and your crew. But be vigilant! As with every action you take time will pass and as you use it to grow in strength so do your enemies!

name: Gangsta Sniper 3: Final Parody
description: Last part of gangsta shooter series. Destroy enemies and finish levels in this meme shooter by finding magic key..

name: Igor Maks: The Meme Lord
description: A fascinating 2D space shooter based on memes. Set off an amazing journey with Igor Maks and reveal the secret of the universe!

name: Nauseous Pines
description: Nauseous Pines is the story of two nightschool students, united by fate and charged with creating their very first video game project.

name: Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire: Collector's Edition
description: Take a deep dive into the magical undersea world of Atlantis Solitaire! Voyage across 400 (!) submarine levels and restore 10 breathtaking Aquascapes. Unlock 18 bonus solitaire variants and enjoy playing 100 levels of a fully featured Mahjong game.

name: One Gun 2: Stickman
description: Back in Stickland, lived-was Stickman. And he had a cat, whom he loved very much. They all did together, even bitcoins mined. But one day ... the cat was gone. And then stickman realized that the time had come and got a shotgun.

name: Hold Your Ground
description: Hold Your Ground is a Virtual Reality Archery Defense game, in which You, the sole defender of your keep, need to hold off multiple waves of increasingly numerous enemies!

name: Uterine Supremacy
description: Uterine Supremacy is a 4 player local multiplayer game. Take control of the building blocks of life. To battle your friends through inspired mini games for the ultimate prize. Life itself. Inspired by true events.

name: Neko-Nin ExHeart 3
description:
This is the third game in Whirlpool’s Neko-nin exHeart series.

It’s been a few months since the cute nekomimi ninjas Yura and Tama came from Fuuma Village to serve the protagonist. Ritsu and Maya have joined them since and their time together have become even more happy and lively. But as expected, a wind of change is in the air.

“I am the next leader of the Saikashu, the successor of Magoichi…. Saika Himari!”

The haughty girl was accompanied by two attendants. What is her objective and what is the Saikashu? The third act has started for this modern ninja cat drama.

name: Lost Existence
description: Explore vast, forgotten lands, banishing ancient horrors, in this open-world voxel action-RPG. Create your own uniquely crafted character class. Build custom multiplayer dungeon, PvP, or siege experiences. Run, vault, and leap effortlessly across endless wilderness, or delve deep underground.

name: Roman Adventures - Britons. Season 2
description: Fearless General Flavius with his detachment cleared the land of Britons from filth. However, it was not enough. The source of evil itself. To this end, the Romans went on a perilous journey through the portal between the worlds.

name: Trial and Terror
description: Surreal, abstract and dark puzzle featuring simple yet challenging mechanics. The retro maze awaits!

name: Framing Dawes
description: Join Bay Dawes and her dead pet rabbit, Dink on their fairy-tale adventure to discover who is Framing Dawes. Talk to inanimate objects, time travel and cast spells while you explore the beautiful 2D hand-drawn world.

name: Battle Dome Redux
description: Battle Dome is back, and better than ever! Battle Dome Redux focuses on the original game play elements of Battle Dome, refining and improving upon every aspect to give you the best Battle Dome experience. Battle Dome Redux is a 5 v 5 competitive Sci-Fi VR shooter.

name: Hexadrift
description: Traverse your way through 11 unique sector maps collecting the resources you need to repair your busted ship. Optimize your fuel usage, plan maximized routes, and watch out for swarming enemies! Hexadrift is a casual 2D-game of strategic planning and evasion!

name: Try not to die
description: Simple shooting game, using your skills and talent to survive as long as you can.in different types of maps, using different guns to defeat the enemys to collect scores and ammos. With the level getting higher,the number of emenys will increase constantly.As the level gets higher and higher, the game will get harder and harder.

name: Project IO
description: Project IO is a first-person, survival horror video game set in the late 1950's, with an emphasis on exploration and narrative.

name: Gunk
description: Gunk is a 2D Platformer inspired by games and it is quite possibly the best game ever made. From the creators of absolutely nothing comes 2019s biggest hit! In this game you play as a snail in a French restaurant.

name: The Paperman
description: The Paperman is a Virtual Reality game for all the horror lovers. In the game you'll have to explore all the levels facing the challenges you encounter.

name: An Egg Can Dream
description: Everyone has a dream, even an egg. Roll your way around to live out your dreams in a world where you don't always belong.

name: Touhou Ibunseki: Ayaria Dawn - ReCreation
description: A classical Monopoly-like game with 20+ Touhou characters and 10+ official maps. Custom level editor, double resource system (money & crystal), electric dispatching, SP required dice throwing and weather system bring you a whole different game experience. Original characters are waiting for your challenge!

name: Esperia ~ Uprising of the Scarlet Witch ~
description: Dive into the world of Esperia, a fantasy tactical RPG with visual novel elements! Lead Diana and her allies into grid-based tactical battles to uncover the secrets of the Kingdom and the world.

name: Galactic Ruler
description: Galactic Ruler offers real time strategy game play at both planetary level and in space! Lead your faction in diplomacy or conquest across a procedurally generated galactic map where any system might hold hostile enemies or resource riches.

name: Kyber Knights
description: A multiplayer VR game by an Arcade for Arcades. Kyber Knights is a fun and easy multiplayer game developed exclusively for VR Arcades. Simple controls and an easy to control Operator View make this fast paced shooter a great choice for Arcades. CURRENTLY ONLY IN LAN.

name: La Mémoire
description: La Mémoire is a futuristic visual novel about longing and the struggle to bring back lost memories, set in a future where humans live alongside androids.

name: Tactical Nexus
description: [BIG VOLUME PUZZLE RPGs/魔塔]It is a game to explore puzzle dungeon that takes more than several hours in one play.There are 12 dungeons, and by purchasing all DLCs, the total number of dungeons will be 60.You can get items according to the dungeon's score, and you can use the items in other dungeons.

name: Every Day's Different
description: "Every Day's Different" is an English voiced visual novel that focuses on slice of life with a more realistic depth. It ranges from romance to heavy topics such as eating disorders and self-worth. The people around you will either benefit or suffer due to your actions, so please choose carefully.

name: The Defender: Farm and Castle 2
description: You are a magician who will protect the castle from the invasion of monsters. Manage your resources, Upgrade skills and build the castle, Increase your population and prepare to deal with more powerful enemies.

name: Risnuch
description: Slash the enemies, improve yourself, join to arena, kill monsters, skeletons, golems.Join the infinity adventure of the Risnuch!

name: Two Weeks in Painland
description: Two Weeks in Painland is a story-driven game about a run-of-the-mill hacker spying on gangsters who are anything but, all while trying to keep his life and limbs in the process. Easier said than done.

name: Marburgh
description: Fight monsters, explore dungeons, craft weapons, save your village

name: Asylum of the Dead
description: Asylum of the Dead is a first person zombie shooting survival game.

name: Protect Your Fool
description: In the role of a guardian protector of the fool, practice and enhance your mouse skills, use your reflexes and quick thinking and make your way through the leaderboard in this brain-melting and unique arcade game.

name: P1r4t3s
description: Gather a fearsome crew and sail the space boarding ships and stations, robbing them naked, and shooting whoever stands in your way in the roguelike with RPG elements P1r4t3s!

name: Escape the Lab
description: “Escape the Lab” – Virtual Reality experience of an Escape Room that focuses on realistic chemical experiments.

name: Flat Form Fighter
description: Chaotic slapdown in a dark universe!

name: Marisa's Marvelous Magic Shop
description:
A Touhou novel-style management simulation.
Enjoy the comical interactions between Marisa and her friends, as you earn money to pay back your loan.

The publisher of this game on Steam is DLsite Official.

name: Maska's Masks
description: The brother and sister that destiny joins, the illusion that emerges ceaselessly and weird masks...What is the true face of mysterious person maska after all? Here, players will explore dreams, illusions, absurdity and reality with Ayr.

name: Shapeshooter
description: SHAPESHOOTER is literally an on-rail shooter, you'll have to clear colonies across 4 planets from a little creatures infestation called polygoneers. But that's not important, you'll not get a story here. You'll get frenetic action, insane music and a super hard challenge!

name: Gred
description: A young child from a road sign has been lost and your goal is to find him ! Incarn BOTH green and red light men and use their powers to switch time and voyage through multiple environments to save him.

name: Stratoscape
description: Stratoscape is a challenging and addictive stationary wave shooter exclusively for VR. Beat your high score as you blast waves of robots and creatures in this solo adventure campaign. Teleport through 8 unique levels, and enjoy some sick techno music on your journey! Just remember... don't look down!

name: BeatAim
description: BeatAim is a rhythm game designed for FPS players with AI generated maps. It makes improving your aim incredibly fun while listening to your favorite songs. Open any music and customize level generation. Combination of osu! and KovaaK's trainer.

name: Thanks For Listening
description: "Thanks for Listening" is a short story-driven game that gives the player the chance to help four radio hosts with their lives.

name: Cucumber Defense VR
description: Because of the abuse of fertilizer hormones, many mutant pests appeared on the planet, sweeping the whole planet of fruits and vegetables. And your vegetable garden will be their next goal. You now have the fate of the whole planet in your hands. grab up your weapons and protect the final fruits.

name: KingSim
description: Become the King in a story-driven 8-bit style game, where choice matters. And try not to die instantly...

name: Terminal Protocol
description: Turn-based tactics game inspired by XCOM series and set in a dystopian cyberpunk universe. Become a hacker - command your viruses in cyberspace battles and manually aim their weapons to perform precision shots and ricochets. Develop your malware, destroy corporate defences and reveal their secrets!

name: Ridiculous Bombing Game
description: Ridiculous Bombing Game, coming 2020. Get Your Mayhem Fix. Unleash the inner pyromanic and blow everything to smithereens. Or simply plant trees! Your choice, just saying.

name: Manic
description: Manic is a thrilling and brutal action game where you must fight off swarms of enemies whilst seeking vengeance against the mysterious group that murdered your family.

name: GolfTopia
description: DESIGN, BUILD and MANAGE your own futuristic golf course. Keep 200 persistent visitors fed, hydrated, and happy. Defend your creation from a growing infestation of weeds with robotic workers and defensive turrets. Evolve your course into a mega resort where nobody wants to go home, EVER!

name: Chaos Galaxy
description: A pixel-art turn-based Galaxy total war game. You can select 14 factions, 54 heroes, hundreds of warships and mecha, and command multiple fleets to carry out great strategic operations on the map of the galaxy.

name: Jazz Age
description: It's 1926 and there's no place on Earth like New York City. You left the small town you grew up in to seek fame, fortune, and romance on Broadway, but success and true love will both proven more elusive than you imagined in this indie adventure, text based RPG.

name: Eternal Dread 2
description: The world was at the edge of despair. Driven to the brink of extinction, mankind exhausted all their able-bodied men in a futile war against the demon hordes, leaving behind only the female, the young and the vulnerable. And so it came to the women to take up arms and protect what remains of humanity.

name: TAL: Wizard's Adventures
description: TAL: Wizard's Adventures follows the adventure of a young wizard’s apprentice. With your help, Phineas has to go through burdens and trials for achievement one main goal. Our hero wants to gain true wizard attribute - the magic hat.

name: I will eat you
description: I will eat you! Run, hide, shout and try to survive in the game, full of fun and funny moments. Play with random players or with friends. But whatever you do, DO NOT ENTER THE DEN OF THE BEAST!

name: Void of Heroes
description: Mech battle royale and team deathmatch! New type of battle royale mode, built around a vertically rising death zone, instead of the common constricting circle!

name: Battle Sorcerer
description: - Online magic battle VR game, "Battle Sorcerers" -Devise your own tactics and win death-defying battles!The power of creation lies within your hands.

name: Lost Island:Battle Royale
description: this a battle royale game many players drop in an island to fight and the last one wins.

name: The End of an Actress
description: A tragic love story about a feckless queen and an impoverished revolutionary, based on the life (and death) of Marie Antoinette.

name: Star Police
description: Tower Defense game

name: Starship Horizons Bridge Simulator
description: Starship Horizons is a multi-player experience allowing 2-6 players commanding a Starship as the bridge officers in the roles of Captain, Flight, Tactical, Science, Operations, and Engineering.

name: The Otterman Empire
description: The Otterman Empire is an intense quick-fire party shooter for one to four players. Working as a team, you must gear up, strap on your jetpack and stop the evil Tiko in his tracks, an otter who just doesn't give a dam! Jet off across the galaxy and stop his experiments from causing havoc in otterspace!

name: Trapped in Fear
description: You are a child that wakes up alone in the middle of the dark and rainy night in your room. You and your family have moved into recently. If you're curious what happens next, immerse yourself into the world of Trapped In Fear!

name: Dupli_City
description: A cyberpunk narrative game in which you use your psychic powers to stop a megacorp's evil A.I. Send your party members on missions, help them make critical relationship decisions, and earn their trust. Also vampires and a robot cat.

name: Slime Slam
description: A classic take on match 4 puzzle games from the 90's. With 4 gameplay modes and local multiplayer, this fast-paced challenging puzzler will keep you on your toes! Highly customizable options for any style of play.

name: Country Clubbing
description: Are your lack of golf skills stressing you out? Are you slicing when you’d rather be beating the other players? Are local gopher populations threatening the well being of your local ranges? Well then, why not try Country Clubbing! Swing to your heart’s content and throw caution (and par) to the wind!

name: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe
description: Hop into your spaceship and battle waves of opponents in your journey to find the legendary space pizza! Now 100% more Deluxe than ever!

name: Epic World
description: Epic World is a Platformer action game with tricky elements, hidden treasures and dangerous enemies. You become an adventurer exploring a continuously evolving levels to recapture the stolen gold from the orcs king.

name: Dark Skies: The Nemansk Incident
description: A hardcore shooter with unforgiving mechanics and deep atmopshere. Every step could be your last. Set in the fictional Nemansk Region in southeast of Russia, your task is to find information about a meteorite and a missing science team.

name: Two Worlds II HD: Shattered Embrace
description: Return to Antaloor for a brand new adventure in the Two Worlds saga! When the ancient Elves resurface on a remote island, an old secret leads to the rise of a new evil. Racing against time, you must travel to the depths of hell and back before secrets of the past destroy the future of the land!

name: Graffiti Bombing
description: Enter the virtual world of Graffiti Bombing and become a graffiti writer. Whether you’re a new artist, seasoned veteran or even all-city hero, you can now enjoy the thrill of being a graffiti writer in the crime-free (relative) safety of virtual reality.

name: Reign of Darkness
description: Reign of Darkness still very much being developed but currently is a "Tab Target", "Theory-Crafting", "Dungeon Runner", and Online Role Playing Game. Being based on classic D&D principles & concepts, where every attack is a virtual roll of the dice, players can "Build" or...

name: D20 Dungeons
description: Enjoy detailed turned-based combat using the 3.75 OGL version of the world's oldest roleplaying game. Create your own characters and send them off on battles you create yourself. Choose from various arenas to fight in. When you're done, head back to town to rest up and equip yourself for the next battle!

name: Orb Rivals
description: Sci-fi football and jet-powered hockey collide in the intergalactic sport of Orb.

name: Nubarron: The adventure of an unlucky gnome
description: Guide Gnome across the dangers of this twisted fairytale world. Can you break the curse that made that annoying cloud appear? Can you recover his stolen Lucky Hat? Can you trust your friends? Find out in Nubarron, a casual puzzle platformer set in a beautiful digitally painted world full of weird creatures you'll have to deal with.

name: Isle of Dinosaurs 2D
description: You got teleported into a prehistoric world. It's time to show the inhabiting dinosaurs why you are not extinct and return back home.

name: Plasmoid
description: 24 levels of hell. The goal of the game is to collect crystals of the same color in a row. Aim wisely, collect combos, get bonuses.

name: The Floor Is Still Really Cheap Lava
description: Avoid randomly placed cheap lava and collect various power-ups along the way to see how far you can get! Multiple game modes are now available.

name: Foodtruck Arena
description: FoodBall, an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round: food and sports. Become one of the legendary chefs, take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents and climb to the top of the culinary world!

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2020
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2020 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite professional basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Super Lobster Run
description: Embark on an Epic Journey as Laughy the Lobster

name: Cyber.one: Trans Car Racing
description: Feel this fascinating experience of driving a car at hyper speed in a cybernetic, physically functioning world. Instead of doing laps on a loop, survive into the raw world in the quickest time. Cyber racing sci-fi. - racing action.

name: Kumo: The Little Robot
description: Help Kumo get out of the tower Go through more than 100 levels in this game requiring reflexes and skill

name: Cave Confectioner
description: Turn cavemen into consumers with the discovery that shaped an age -- sugar. Farm crops, discover new recipes, and sell baked goods in this back-to-the-land agricultural business simulation.

name: Meandering Fiend
description: Explore tons of unique mazes with lots of places to get lost and turned around. Can you find your way through all the mazes and find the secret items scattered throughout?

name: Null Drifter
description: Null Drifter is a 1BIT LO-FI shooter, a journey into the void inside a computer simulation! Lose yourself in this frenetic yet chill experience!

name: Heroes Forces
description: Heroes Forces is a small adventure with strong RPG elements such as Crafting, Talents, Leveling, Dungeoning, Class changes and a Market.

name: Dragon Stone: Legendary Archer
description: This game is a hero defense game where you have to collect items and raise your hero's stats quickly in order to stop the monsters which getting stronger gradually.

name: Project Ara - Crucible
description: Project Ara - Crucible is a bullet hell type shoot’em’up featuring procedural content generation in addition to light RPG elements. Help Lethe Zelmiya, the forgetful wizard on her epic quest to graduate from the Myrellian Academy of Magic.

name: Yuki Onna
description: Yuki Onna is a PS1 inspired survival horror game. Some children went missing out of the blue. You receive a letter that says, "Come alone or I'll freeze them to death." Out of desperation, you decide to embark on a daunting rescue mission to an abandoned inn up the piercing cold mountains.

name: Pull Stay
description: Pull Stay is a wacky Beat 'em up game with Tower Defense mechanics. Use your fists or set crazy traps to repel enemies from rushing into your house! Defend your buddy Susumu, who goes out of his house only once in every two months for his haircut!

name: The Ugly Christmas Sweater Game
description: You are an elf: Alone and running out of magic. Your only hope is to get to the mall and catch a ride with Santa, but you won't be able to stay invisible long enough to get to the mall. Everyone is wearing ugly Christmas sweaters. Who will notice an extra elf in a sweater? Time to get sweater hopping to the mall!

name: Race Race Racer
description: Feel the rush as you tear down the track at breakneck speeds in a thrilling car race to the finish.

name: Vile Matter
description: Trapped in a deteriorating world of mystery, navigate a series of challenges & deadly puzzles in pursuit of a mysterious figure that's always one step ahead. Can you outwit this prison of shadows and survive long enough to find an answer to the madness? Or, will you fail and be consumed by the darkness?

name: Awesome Pea 2
description:
Greedy Pea is back in game! Dark dungeons, deadly traps, everything is green, a lot of gold everywhere!

Awesome Pea 2 - next chapter of classic platformer game. Greedy Pea is back in game! Now even more dark dungeons, deadly traps and gold!

name: Rats for Breakfast
description: Repair enchanted machinery with anything at hand, and face whatever unknown terrors lurk below, in this bizarre post-apocalyptic fantasy horror game from the developer of DUSK, Fingerbones, and The Moon Sliver.

name: Hope's Farm
description: Match your way through an incredible farming adventure. Grow crops, plant trees, raise adorable animals and customize a wonderful farm.

name: Runner Heroes: The Curse of Night and Day
description: RUNNER HEROES is a unique adventure in which you control two characters at the same time. Play in single mode or with a friend in two cooperative modes. Addiction and challenge at full speed through 47 levels. Do you accept the challenge?

name: Paunch
description: With 12 lives for two, players must fight to gain points from each kill. The containers of life are boulders freely moved by characters in the arena and used for throwing. In hand-to-hand combat the characters interact using their muscles and initiate targeted hits. When all containers are exhausted the game enters the final stage, where the victorious player takes the points earned.

name: Suite 776
description: A pure terror with a twisted backstory; jumping straight into the horrors surrounding Suite 776.

name: FIshing Adventure VR
description: Fishing Adventure VR is a typical fishing game, where the player can (drums) catch different fish species! Fish in USA, Hawaii and other unique fisheries.

name: Mokoko
description: A nostalgic arcade gameplay remastered! Capture areas and save the girls from various troublemakers. Comes along with 24 unique bosses and their absurd stories! Inspired from games like Volfied, Qix, Gals Panic.

name: Space Climber
description: Two space exterminators prepared to clean the galaxy from vermin. Collect ammo for your rifle and oxygen tanks. Old school game, funny, difficult and addictive. Compatible with keyboard and controller. 1 or 2 players (Remote Play Together). Demo available.

name: Winter Polaris
description: A mysterious global pandemic is making people disappear into thin air. A mysterious glass object carried by a girl found adrift at sea. Two stories that set two pairs of protagonists off on separate journeys around the world. What does it mean to live, make mistakes, and live again?

name: Old Town Stories
description: Old Town, 1927. Ignithium technology has caused a huge leap leading to the dawn of war robots. In a city of smuggling and crime, Rose, an upper class girl, joins the Irish mafia to fight off Rusty Jack's robotic mafia, using advanced weapons in a frantic adventure to write her story in Old Town.

name: Rambunny
description: Join in an adventure with hidden traps, escape from a fireball rains, drive a scooter, face a giant fox robot, explore caves, fly in a rocket and defeat the evil boss to bring the bunnies home!

name: Santa's Holiday
description: Sleighbells are ringing and Christmas is around the corner, but Santa has gone on vacation! Your assistance is urgently needed to make Christmas still happen.

name: The Aftermath: Unnatural Selection
description: The Aftermath: Unnatural Selection, is a story driven Survival/RPG game set years after human civilization has been decimated by an Alien invasion

name: Remuage - MeltySensation
description: "Remuage - MeltySensation" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Aozora Under Girls!", so we have created a special customized "Remuage - MeltySensation" for VR users.

name: Drone Combat
description: The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy base and this can be achieved by controlling the hill in the map center, defeating AI and collecting upgrades, or defeating the mini boss(Thus summoning them to your team as an AI attacker).

name: The Last Deathbound
description: The Last Deathbound is a fast-paced rogue-lite arena fighter game. You'll be fighting for your survival against impossible odds. Equipped with just a sword, it would seem that you are destined to fall. Will you defy that fate?

name: Fighting Moore
description: Fighting Moore is a VR action-adventure focused around intense and fast-paced melee and magic combat. Through innovative VR UI mechanics allowing for real-time execution of back-to-back-to-back attacks, you have the control to take on 1vs5+ battles while exploring 5 unique environments.

name: Battle Round
description: BattleRound is a quick paced and easy-going game. Play with an assortment of captivating characters and utilize boundless strategies to gain the advantage over your opponents - A compelling battlefield from beginning to end, will begin now!

name: Cyborg Mechanic
description: Become a cyborg surgeon mechanic in shady and absurd cyberpunk underworld. Diagnose your clients, cut off limbs and remove organs, upgrade bodies and brains. Attach fancy augmentations during complex procedures. Expand your skills and your workshop.

name: West Sweety
description: Welcome to the bar in the wild west, in this game, you roled a cowboy, use bullets & the wisdom of luck to conquer the beauty...

name: Food Factory VR
description: Food Factory VR is an exciting casual game with foods theme. Easy to play and operate, there is a feature that anyone can enjoy easy and fun. Let's compete with users around the world in various stages that require player competition.

name: Under Party
description: UnderParty is an Action Platformer game. This game is made up of a very high level of difficulty. It's very violent (Gore,Ryona), so be careful.

name: Terro Lunkka Adventures
description: Be a Hero game developer Terro and save Waste game store agreements from evil CIPE store evils

name: Best in the West
description: Compete for #1. Best in the West is a Wild West shoot out experience! Grab a gun and blast your opponents with revolvers, double barreled shotguns, and other western weapons. Explore the woods and find loot to survive to be the last one standing.

name: The Area 51 Secret: Boombox Killer
description: Ted & Herber are chilling on the sofa doing homework when the door ring... it's a secret agent from the Area 51 warning the neighborhood about an alien killer that escaped the base during the 20th September raid.. Will they be safe? Will they discover the secrets of Area 51?... It's all up to you in this interactive story!

name: Counter Terrorism - Minesweeper
description: Base on budget control to locate and capture those terrorists, stop them before the attack countdown. Gameplay method inspired by the minesweeper.

name: Zzzzz
description: Who's behind this? Zzzzz is a hardcore platformer where you have to overcome a series of challenging levels in order to find the answers you're looking for.

name: Guns and Braps
description: Fight for survival and supremacy in an unforgiving and lawless landscape. Scour your surroundings for weapons, ammunition, base supplies and vehicles. Build a base, grow and fortify it, amass a vast arsenal of weapons and dominate invading players. Raid other player's bases with your spoils of war and grow your empire.

name: Castle in the Darkness II
description: Sin descripción

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command
description: Starship Troopers: Terran Command is a thrilling real-time strategy game set in the Starship Troopers movies universe. Take command of the Mobile Infantry and do your part in the war against the Arachnid threat. Ensure that human civilization, not insect, dominates the galaxy now and always!

name: BOC
description: BOC: Birth Of Civilization, is a historical turn-based 4X strategy game, which includes features like 360º realistic worlds on a global scale, hardcore tactical components, and climate simulation. Our approach will take players all the way from the Ice Age (55.000 B.C) up until the fall of the Western Roman Empire.

name: The Rewinder
description:
The Rewinder is a 2D puzzle adventure game inspired by traditional Chinese folklore.

The game uses pixel art to mimic the aesthetics of Chinese ink paintings. Players will get to meet mythological figures such as the Spirit Wardens, the Ox-head and Horse-face Guardians of the Beyond, and the Tudi Gong (Keeper of the Land).

The player takes on the role of Qi Yun, a "rewinder" who has the ability to enter people's memories and influence their actions. By utilizing "senses" and swaying others' "intentions", he can change history.

name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures: Episode 2 - The Last Resort
description:
Wallace & Gromit in The Last Resort is the second episode of Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures.

Wallace & Gromit are finally ready for some vacation. Sadly before they go the water main bursts and the cellar get's flooded. And to make things worse, after the leak has been dealt with the weather changes and it starts to rain heavily. Of course Wallace wouldn't be Wallace if he didn't think of an alternative: If they can't go to the beach, why not bring the beach to them? With all the water already in the cellar, only a few more ingredients are missing. After everything is finished, Wallace also senses a new business idea: West Wallaby Street's Waterworld.

name: Apple Knight
description: Apple Knight is a modern action platformer with tight controls, fluid player movement, and smooth animation. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Defeat tough bosses. Fight your way through hordes of evil wizards, knights, and creatures - or activate traps to take them out from a safe distance!

name: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 2: Give No Shelter
description: The Walking Dead: Michonne stars the iconic, blade-wielding character made famous by Robert Kirkman's best-selling comic books. The story explores the period in the comic book timeline where Michonne leaves Rick, their group, and her katana behind, in order to deal with emotional demons from her past. Players will discover what took Michonne away from her trusted allies, and what brought her back to them.

name: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve
description: The Walking Dead: Michonne stars the iconic, blade-wielding character made famous by Robert Kirkman's best-selling comic books. The story explores the period in the comic book timeline where Michonne leaves Rick, their group, and her katana behind, in order to deal with emotional demons from her past. Players will discover what took Michonne away from her trusted allies, and what brought her back to them.

name: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea
description: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea is a two-part single-player expansion to BioShock Infinite. Burial at Sea primarily takes place in the underwater metropolis Rapture before the events of the first BioShock game. Development of Infinite's downloadable content commenced immediately after finishing the main game. Irrational Games was drawn to returning to the setting of Rapture and using Infinite's gameplay systems to create a version of the city before its ruin in BioShock. Reception to Burial at Sea's two episodes was mixed. While the return to Rapture was generally praised, the first episode drew criticism for its short length and a lack of differentiated gameplay. Reviews for the second episode were more positive, with multiple critics calling Burial at Sea a fitting swan song for Irrational's work on BioShock, as the studio reorganized.

name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode 4 - Escape Plan Bravo
description: A new episodic adventure set in the badlands of Pandora. This collaborative brain child, is set after the events of Borderlands 2 and is a part of the franchise' official lore.

name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode 5 - The Vault of the Traveler
description: A new episodic adventure set in the badlands of Pandora. This collaborative brain child, is set after the events of Borderlands 2 and is a part of the franchise' official lore.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 1: Tangled Up in Blue
description:
Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series delivers a brand new story of the universe’s unlikeliest heroes, the rag-tag band of outlaws who go by the names Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot. In the wake of an epic battle, the Guardians discover an artifact of unspeakable power. 
 
From Earth to the Milano to Knowhere and beyond, and set to the beat of awesome music, this five-part episodic series puts you in the rocket-powered boots of Star-Lord in an original Guardians adventure, told in the unique and award-winning Telltale style, where your decisions and actions will drive the path of the story you experience.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 2: Under Pressure
description:
The Guardians just can’t seem to outrun the past (or their tab), but if they figure out how to control the untold power of their mysterious new relic, they might not have to. With help from dubious old friends and unwilling new allies, Star-Lord and company scour the galaxy for answers. But how long can they elude the genocidal maniac hunting them? And will simmering tensions finally tear the team apart? 
 
Episode two of a five part episodic game series.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 3: More than a Feeling
description:
After tracing the origin of the Eternity Forge to a mysterious temple, the Guardians encounter an eccentric being who might hold the key to unlocking the relic’s true power. But with Gamora and Nebula busy wrestling with the past and Hala still bent on reclaiming the Forge by any means necessary, it falls to Peter to make a crucial decision that could change the fate of the galaxy -- and the Guardians -- forever. 
 
Episode three of a five part episodic game series.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 4: Who Needs You
description:
With the fate of the Eternity Forge decided, the Guardians are left more bitterly divided than ever. But this growing tension is temporarily sidelined by a more pressing problem: escaping a dark and treacherous cavern before they all get eaten alive. As the cave’s hidden threats creep closer, Star-Lord must hold his crew together if he hopes to keep everyone safe. Safety, however, may ultimately come at a terrible cost... 
 
Episode four of a five part episodic game series.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series - Episode 5: Don't Stop Believin
description:
In the aftermath of an unbearable sacrifice, the Guardians finally fracture. With her opposition in shambles, Hala renews her campaign of death and devastation, carving a path of indiscriminate destruction en route to Knowhere. If he hopes to avoid catastrophe (and save his own skin), Star-Lord must search his feelings, reunite his team, and mount one final mission to save the galaxy...again. 
 
Episode five of a five part episodic game series.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2
description:
Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is an action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Released in October 2023 exclusively for the PlayStation 5, it is a direct sequel to Marvel's Spider-Man (2018) and Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales (2020). The game continues the story of Peter Parker and Miles Morales as they face new challenges and threats in New York City.

In Marvel's Spider-Man 2, players can switch between Peter and Miles, each with unique abilities and combat styles. The game introduces new villains, including Kraven the Hunter and Venom, while expanding the open-world environment with more detailed and interactive elements.

name: Gunpey
description: Gunpey is a new kind of musical puzzle game where you flip lines and flip the music. In this one-of-a-kind puzzle experience, your objective is to flip the lines, located in squares, to connect them over five columns. Connecting lines from left to right remove the connected row. If an incomplete line reaches the top of the screen, the game is over. Gunpey will test your reflexes, stretch your mind and dazzle your senses. With 40 varied backgrounds and stylized music, and two-player multiplayer over wireless ad-hoc connectivity, this puzzle title is the game to pick up.

name: Frontline Commando 2
description:
Let the bullets fly in the sequel to the popular third-person shooter, Frontline Commando! 
Betrayed and left for dead, you must build your team of mercenaries and exact revenge against your enemies.

name: Samurai vs. Zombies Defense 2
description: The Samurai is back... and he’s brought friends! Play as the heroic Samurai, the deadly Kunoichi Assassin, and the stalwart Armored Ronin to defend your village against even nastier hordes of brutal zombies and demons! Recruit allies, build defenses, and recover sacred Artifacts to stop them!

name: Frontline Commando: WW2 Shooter
description: Join the battle for Europe in the exciting sequel to Frontline Commando: D-Day. Close in on the Occupation with each mission, make your way to the heart of Berlin, and lead the Allied forces to victory! History depends on you!

name: Contract Killer: Sniper
description:
You are a master assassin, hired to infiltrate secure locations and eliminate high-profile targets. Perform lethal strikes and follow your only rule: Honor The Contract. 
A new threat as appeared! Cyborgs and Mechanized Combat Units are invading cities around the world. Behind this nefarious act is a secret military organization which have been kidnapping scientists for use in developing their once-secret nanocrystal technology, which is at the heart of their cybernetic augmentation project. You have been hired to push back this invasion, at all costs!

name: Contract Killer: Zombies
description: You have killed more criminals than you can count. Now it’s time to face the apocalypse and blow the crap out of thousands of zombies! From the team that brought you Contract Killer comes CONTRACT KILLER: ZOMBIES.

name: Super Smash Flash
description:
Choose your characters and options and battle it out with 28 different characters in the original title that started it all – Super Smash Flash!
This award-winning Super Smash Bros. fangame is complete with Classic Mode, Adventure Mode, and all of the things that make Smash Bros. feel like Smash Bros, with characters and content you’d never expect sprinkled about. Have fun!

name: Gang of Four
description: Enter the relentless world of underground Chinese mafia! The Gang of Four card game embodies an endless battle for supremacy - where the weak perish and the strong dominate! Play your cards with cunning and tactics to snatch the victory!

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 6: A Portal to Mystery
description: Minecraft: Story Mode is an adventure game set in a Minecraft world. It is a five-part episodic series that will take you to the Nether, the Farlands, the End, and beyond! You will drive how the story flows through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action.

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 7: Access Denied
description: Minecraft: Story Mode is an adventure game set in a Minecraft world. It is a five-part episodic series that will take you to the Nether, the Farlands, the End, and beyond! You will drive how the story flows through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action.

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 8: A Journey's End?
description: Minecraft: Story Mode is an adventure game set in a Minecraft world. It is a five-part episodic series that will take you to the Nether, the Farlands, the End, and beyond! You will drive how the story flows through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action.

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 1: All That Remains
description: With the loss of Lee Everett and almost everyone else she could call a friend bearing down on her mind, Clementine continues to make the best of a life that gives new meaning to pain. With only memories and a pack on her back, what will Clementine find next?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided
description: After gaining new friends (and enemies), Clementine has found her way into the lives of more survivors. Now, she fights for her life against an army of the dead with one wounded companion. How will she beat this new threat?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 3: In Harm's Way
description: After reuniting with her old friend, Kenny, Clementine is now prisoner to a man with the intention of preparing mankind's next generation for survival, through any means necessary. Can she and her friends escape?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 4: Amid the Ruins
description: With the group scattered amidst a swarm of monsters sent from hell, Clementine's only goal is finding her friends and keeping them safe. Now, armed with only a hatchet, can she gather all of her friends before trouble finds them?

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 5: No Going Back
description: The birth of Rebecca's son and subsequent death of the baby's mother has started a new battle for survival which promises to not end quietly. Through the harshest weather she has seen thus far, can Clementine protect the group's newest member and keep everyone she cares about alive?

name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 1: Ties That Bind - Part One
description: When Javier and his family accidentally cross paths with a rival group, a simple misunderstanding quickly spirals out of control.

name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 2: Ties That Bind - Part Two
description:
In the wake of escalating trouble, Javier leads a group of refugees towards the safety of a nearby town.

"Ties That Bind", retitled "Episode 12", is the second episode of Telltale Games' The Walking Dead: A New Frontier. It is a two-episode premiere, with the first part also named "Ties That Bind".

name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 3: Above the Law
description:
Shocking developments drive a wedge between brothers-in-arms.

"Above The Law", retitled "Episode 13", is the third episode of Telltale Games' The Walking Dead: Season Three.

name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 4: Thicker Than Water
description:
When the community is threatened from within, Javier manages unlikely alliances for the safety of his loved ones.

"Thicker Than Water", retitled Episode 14, is the fourth episode of Telltale Games' The Walking Dead: A New Frontier.

name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - Episode 5: From the Gallows
description:
Javier and the others are faced with great sacrifices to salvage what remains.

"From The Gallows", retitled "Episode 15", is the fifth and final episode of Telltale Games' The Walking Dead: A New Frontier.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 1: Iron From Ice
description: Based on HBO’s award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 2: The Lost Lords
description: Based on HBO's award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 3: The Sword in the Darkness
description: Based on HBO's award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 4: Sons of Winter
description: Based on HBO's award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 5: A Nest of Vipers
description: Based on HBO's award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series - Episode 6: The Ice Dragon
description: Based on HBO's award-winning television drama, Game of Thrones – A Telltale Games Series tells the story of House Forrester, a noble house from the north of Westeros. Caught up in the events of The War of the Five Kings, they are placed in a precarious position where members of the household must do everything they can to prevent the house from meeting its doom.

name: Christmas Cats Revenge
description: Christmas Cats Revenge is a Christmas themed 2D Platform Action game based on the story of the war which broke out between Kim Cats and Kon Cats Kingdoms.

name: Drunk Santa Simulator
description: Drunk Santa Simulator is the simulator you have been waiting for since your first xmas. Become Santa, a raging alcoholic with anger management issues. Discover how shitty Santa's job is, how annoying all those letters and the bloody elves really are.

name: Super Squad
description: Super Squad is a team-based Multiplayer Online Shoot-‘Em-Up (MOSH) where squads duke it out in a manic-strategic battle for domination. Tactics, teamwork and twitch reflexes are required to claim victory over the enemy Squad, with top-down shooter controls, an abundance of awesome abilities, and a multitude of modes to master.

name: Soundart
description: Become one with sound and beauty...Pound, swing, and thrust away! A revolution in VR rhythm games!The automatically generated "scores" are literally infinite... Make - no, BECOME art, together with your favorite music!Show off your skills live as you play and get the audience rocking!

name: Choppa: Rescue Rivals
description: Choppa: Rescue Rivals is a chaotic arcade-style helicopter rescue competition game for one to four players. Take off with your trusty rescue chopper and carry disaster victims to safety before your rivals!

name: Liquid Space
description: Liquid Space lets you interact with ultra-realistic liquids in zero gravity on the international space station.

name: Moko's Advice
description: A dark comedy choice game about appeasement

name: Takenoko
description: The most-talented gardeners in Imperial Japan are competing to see who is worthy of taking care of the sacred panda. Cultivate your plots, grow bamboo and complete objectives in the official digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game.

name: Laser Z
description: Step into an 80's VaporWave inspired VR world where the goal is destroy the cubes and stay alive. Wield the laser to destroy the cubes. Easy to learn but hard to master. Laser Z pumps up the volume with it's retro 80s original soundtrack.

name: Dream Home
description: Build, expand, decorate and meet your clients' expectations, because only one home can be THE DREAM HOME! The digital adaptation of the award-winning board game.

name: Bronze Hoof
description: A hardcore antique-style arcade game.

name: Zombie Island
description: Can you clear the islands from the zombies that are lurking on them? Can you find out what caused this to happen... Can you find the easter eggs? Why not try it out...

name: Monsters sandbox
description: Multiplayer game with the ability to connect via LAN or Internet. Fight monsters alone or with friends. Find weapons and ammunition during the game or buy them in the store. Different game modes.

name: Galactic Asteroids Patrol
description: Modern, fast-paced, asteroid shooting frenzy!

name: Sick Way
description: Sick Way is an adventure horror game that takes place in the small town of Grootlin. You play as an ordinary person who works in a factory. But suddenly something went wrong ...

name: Fight of Animals
description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more are now become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!! Players are able to fight through arcade mode become the King of Animals!

name: Hermes: War of the Gods
description: As an evil force rises to shatter Earth, you must stand firm or the world will fall! Answer the call of Zeus and begin the adventure today!

name: Co-Jump, Fly
description: Sin descripción

name: ScribbleDude
description: In ScribbleDude, you play as an unknown creature who wants to explore the world around him and defeat the evil forces. It's a challenging non-linear 2D platformer where you encounter action-filled platforming with gimmicks, explore areas and defeat unique bosses.

name: Pretty Angel
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: Veggie Killer Remastered
description: Do you know this? A vegan hippy coming up to you to tell you what to eat and what not? Even worse, all their veggies got mutated! It's time to defend your grill and show those evil veggies what you are made of - strong manly meat. ALL HAIL THE BACON!

name: Kill The Emoji: The Remake
description: They have gone too far with the emojis, now its time to kill them all (Once again and with new funky colors and emojis)!

name: Dragon Castle: The Board Game
description: A multiplayer board game freely inspired by the Mahjong Solitaire. Play Solo or against players from all over the world with Online and Local Pass & Play modes! Pick tiles from the central castle to create sets of tiles of the same kind and score points. From the creators of Potion Explosion.

name: Tower Empire Builder
description: In Tower Empire Builder you will construct a state of the art skyscraper in a rapidly growing city. You will need to balance your supply of condos, offices, retail space, and hotel rooms to meet market demand, while supplying high end amenities and quality staff to keep everyone happy.

name: Another Try
description:
Another Try is a classic survival in a low poly world. 
 
Explore the world alone or with friends. Build houses and protect them from external threats. Collect resources, weapons and food. Create alliances with other players and form cities. 
All this will help you survive in the harsh world of the post-Apocalypse.

name: Dead Age 2
description: The successful indie survival RPG "Dead Age" (84% very positive) is back with a vengeance! No other game offers this mix of role-playing, rogue-like, fast-paced turn-based combat and survival all in one.

name: Mineirinho Director's Cut
description: A really cool 3d platform game, lots of extreme adventures with our friend Miner, now we have the option Double Miner and the adventure gets a lot cooler. Director's Cut version has unpublished scenes that have never been seen.

name: Mystery Case Files: Black Crown - Collector's Edition
description: A visit to Manchester Asylum takes a dangerous turn into madness! When an inmate at the Manchester Asylum draws a huge crown covering the walls of her cell, you’re sent to learn what, if anything, it has to do with your past. But when the inmates escape, there’s only one way for you to regain control — find the Black Crown before they do. You’ll need to gather your wits and use all your abilities to learn the identity of “Jane Doe” and solve the mystery of the Black Crown in this new chapter of the classic hidden-object puzzle adventure game series.

name: Days Gone By
description: Standard Platform Game developed following a tile to tile mindset with the Godot Engine.

name: Deathbloom: Chapter 2
description: Inspired by classic survival horror. Bachman Manor sprawls into a maze of corridors, bedrooms, foyers, and more. Filled with puzzles, traps, and hidden passageways that explore the secrets of its dark history and occupants.

name: the Haunted House VR Ep.1 Movie "missing"
description:
The Haunted House VR is the first of its kind.

남형사는 아내를 잃고 고등학생 딸과 함께 지내고 있다. 어느날 딸의 갑작스런 실종. 딸의 친구를 통해 딸이 오컬트 마니아라는 것을 듣고 충격에 빠진다. 딸의 마지막 행적이 영덕에 있는 흉가였다는 것을 알게 된 남형사는 달빛조차 없는 어두운 산속 도로를 달려 영덕 흉가에 도착하는데...

name: Winter Worm, Summer Grass
description: Silver medal-winning Japanese otome horror visual novel FREE to download and play with three different endings. A gothic romance set in a mountain village where a curse makes flowers grow from people's bodies. Will you find a cure for the curse?

name: Ariborne: Trials
description: Airborne is a game with a series of trials that get progressively harder. The trials contain parkour and puzzles that you must surpass. In these trials you will encounter many platforms that can be friend or foe, or there just kind of there and don't do anything but that usually doesn't happen.

name: The Wolf Among Us: Episode 1 - Faith
description:
The first episode of The Wolf Among Us, a five-episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo).

The first murder of a Fable in several years leads Bigby on the trail of a killer.

name: The Wolf Among Us: Episode 2 - Smoke and Mirrors
description:
The second episode of The Wolf Among Us, a five-episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo).

Bigby continues investigating the 'serial killer' walking the streets of Fabletown. He also attempts to find answers from Faith's pimp: Georgie Porgie, and becomes more involved with Beauty and Beast's affairs.

name: The Wolf Among Us: Episode 3 - A Crooked Mile
description:
The third episode of The Wolf Among Us, a five-episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo).

Following a shocking revelation, Bigby pursues Ichabod Crane, who is now in hiding.

name: The Wolf Among Us: Episode 4 - In Sheep's Clothing
description:
The fourth episode of The Wolf Among Us, a five-episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo).

Bigby must delve into the criminal underworld to find the Crooked Man.

name: The Wolf Among Us: Episode 5 - Cry Wolf
description:
The fifth episode of The Wolf Among Us, a five-episode series based on Fables (DC Comics/Vertigo).

Secrets are revealed and decisions are made as Bigby squares off against the Crooked Man, facing off against his deadliest agent, Bloody Mary and learns the full truth about his crimes against Fabletown.

name: Crayon Shin-Chan 4: Ora no Itazura Dai Henshin
description: Crayon Shin-Chan 4: Ora no Itazura Dai Henshin is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: The Political Process
description: Explore a dynamic world of politics in this turn-based, political simulator. Create a character, run for political office, write legislation, balance budgets, and more as you move up the political hierarchy.

name: Camp Buddy
description: Camp Buddy is a boys love/yaoi visual novel featuring the adventures of Keitaro Nagame in the summer scout-themed camp called Camp Buddy. Help Keitaro with his decisions and create a special bond with your chosen partner. Take the chance and make the greatest memories!

name: nStations
description: If you think this is just another simulation game about a post-apocalyptic event where people now need to colonize outer worlds... You're SOOOO wrong. This game is the first of this genre where you can start playing in any supported platform and keep playing on others and come back anytime you want. HD graphics and outstanding sound effects and simulation features playable anywhere.

name: Aikagi
description: Sunohara Nozomu finds himself at his wits' end when his parents told him to move out on his own to learn how to become more independent, but he's having trouble finding a place that feels like home. That's when his childhood friend, Takanashi Shiori, gives the conflicted Nozomu a shocking request...

name: Borderlands 2: Mechromancer Pack
description: This DLC grants the Mechromancer, a 5th playable character class who can summon a destructive robot named Deathtrap. In addition to this new class, this pack also includes bonus items which were included in the Borderlands 2 Premiere Club Pack, including the Gearbox Gold Gun Pack, a Golden Key, which unlocks rare items in the mysterious Sanctuary Loot Chest, and the Vault Hunter’s Relic, which boosts your gear-hunting fortunes.

name: Borderlands 2: Psycho Pack
description: Take a peek at Pandora from behind the menacing eyes of Krieg, the Psycho Bandit, an all-new character and the 6th playable class in Borderlands 2. You’ve fought against them as enemies, now use that aggressive energy on the vault hunter’s side. Slice, dice, light yourself on fire and blow things up – taking damage was never so rewarding – or so much fun!

name: Crackinho Beat' em up in the World
description:
Crackinho is a game inspired by classic 90's Beat 'em up games like Streets of Rage, Final Fight, Battletoads, River City Ransom, among others.

Although inspired by theses games, ours is a fresh and modern take on this Genre. Crackinho Beat' em Up is quite different, because besides the classic brawling, it adds a lot of special attacks and variations for the same strike.

The scenario was 100% made by us, the concepts, 3D models and textures. The traditional 2D animations, inspired by Cuphead, gives it a pinch of charm to the game.

We're also planning to launch the multiplayer version and online co-op.

As you explore the game, you'll unlock new features for customize the character
such as hats, clothes, toys, visual aspects and special attacks.
The more you go further the funnier it will become!

name: Webmaster - Fantastic Adventures in the World of the Internet
description: Sin descripción

name: Cookiator
description: Sin descripción

name: Uninhabited Island Story - Another World
description: Sin descripción

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator
description: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator is a freeware episodic point-and-click adventure video game for Microsoft Windows developed by Francisco Gonzalez of Grundislav Games. The game consists of eight individual episodes, or cases, with an overarching plot connecting them together.

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 8: Relics of the Past
description:
The events of final eight part of Ben Jordan's paranormal investigations start exactly after the end of the previous game The Cardinal Sins. Percival Quentin Jones is driving a car with the unconscious Ben Jordan to his flat in London. It is 30th December 2004 and only two days are left until the dark ritual of Cardinal Genovese will be performed. This ritual is tightly connected with relics of the past collected by his Knights of St. Anthony in places visited by Ben Jordan in previous cases. 
 
Just like the previous titles the genre is a classic icon-based point-and-click adventure with voice-overs. The player controls Ben Jordan in London and Paris most of the game, but also Ben's Grandfather, Arthur Jordan, while he was accompanied by Percy Q. Jones in the land of Romania to fight vampires in 1926. There are several puzzles and time-based sequences, where protagonists should think quickly to achieve the desired result or they can even die.

name: République: Episode 1- Exordium
description: You receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state. Hacking into an elaborate surveillance network, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes.

name: République: Episode 2 - Metamorphosis
description: You receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state. Hacking into an elaborate surveillance network, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes.

name: République: Episode 3 - Ones and Zeroes
description: You receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state. Hacking into an elaborate surveillance network, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes.

name: République: Episode 4 - God's Acre
description: You receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state. Hacking into an elaborate surveillance network, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes.

name: République: Episode 5 - Terminus
description: You receive a call from Hope, a woman trapped inside a mysterious totalitarian state. Hacking into an elaborate surveillance network, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes.

name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse - Episode 2: The Tomb of Sammun-Mak
description:
Episode 2 of an epic 5 game saga.

After facing a pillaging primate from outer space in the series premiere, Sam & Max cross paths with even stranger characters in this episode -- their own great-grandparents!

In Episode 2 of the series, our heroes cross paths with an even more bizarre and dangerous pair of characters—their own great-grandparents! Join these characters as they embark on their trippiest trip yet, leapfrogging across ten decades and possibly as many continents (we haven’t counted) in search of the mysterious force that’s causing all the trouble.

Where did it come from? Why is it triggering Max's latent psychic powers? Why is it desired by everyone aboard the Disorient Express? And what, exactly, is the Secret of the Sphunx?

* Episode 1: The Penal Zone
* Episode 2: The Tomb of Sammun-Mak
* Episode 3: They Stole Max's Brain!
* Episode 4: Beyond the Alley of the Dolls
* Episode 5: The City That Dares Not Sleep - Finale

name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse - Episode 3: They Stole Max's Brain!
description:
Episode 3 of an epic 5 game saga.

In Episode 3, freelance shamus Sam gets steamin' mad, when someone snatches his little buddy's noodle, gunning for control of its inner powers. Now Sam's going all noir to get it back! Was it the giant gorilla? The two-bit rat? Or the fishy dame that runs the greasy-spoon? The caper is getting more and more twisty, and Sam's rolling up his sleeves, smackin' heads and throwin’ slugs to crack the case.

* Episode 1: The Penal Zone
* Episode 2: The Tomb of Sammun-Mak
* Episode 3: They Stole Max's Brain!
* Episode 4: Beyond the Alley of the Dolls
* Episode 5: The City That Dares Not Sleep - Finale

name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse - Episode 4: Beyond the Alley of the Dolls
description:
Episode 4 of an epic 5 game saga.

In Episode 4, the indescribable forces that have been pulling the Freelance Police’s strings begin revealing themselves, in a tale that will change the way you look at Sam & Max...forever!

An onslaught of oversized canine clones akin to a zombie apocalypse has our heroes running for cover in a barricaded ramshackle diner as the episode begins. And it gets even stranger from there.

Who’s responsible for this march of flabby dog flesh? The creepy old sorcerer? The creepy space ape? The creepy diner owner? Or some other creep?
